statements: DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM carbon_emissions WHERE id = 1 AND emission_type = 'Industrial';
DELETE FROM offsetting_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Transportation' AND date_completed = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM offsetting_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Planting Trees' AND date_completed > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM carbon_offsetting WHERE offset_id = 100 AND company_id = 1;
DELETE FROM OffsetActivities WHERE user_id = 5 AND offset_date < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM OffsetActivities WHERE user_id = 100 AND offset_date < '2022-01-01';
